/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the city's daily life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades hinting at the architectural diversity of the city. Trees and streetlights punctuate the scene, adding elements of nature and man-made structure. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the colors of the cityscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
